trans-unit.target: TEXT_JOBDEFRPM_00863_BERURU_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! It's a pleasure to cross paths with you again.

TEXT_JOBDEFRPM_00863_BERURU_000_010<tab>My journey continues, thanks to you and Kupopo. After my return to reality, I took to the road in search of fresh perspectives, and I've found plenty of them here in Radz-at-Han.
TEXT_JOBDEFRPM_00863_BERURU_000_011<tab>This city fascinates me to no end... Life flourishes in every color, and my imagination has grown all the richer for it!

TEXT_JOBDEFRPM_00863_BERURU_000_012<tab>I plan to roam Thavnair for a time and aid those in need along the way. If I can make a positive difference in this world with my pictomancy─just as you and our predecessors have─then it will all be worth it.
TEXT_JOBDEFRPM_00863_BERURU_000_020<tab>As you well know, we pictomancers are wielders of the imagination, rendering our wildest dreams into reality with a magicked brush.
TEXT_JOBDEFRPM_00863_BERURU_000_021<tab>The origins of pictomancy can be traced back to the Fifth Astral Era, when a young woman named Relm began weaving aether into her works of art.

TEXT_JOBDEFRPM_00863_BERURU_000_022<tab>Relm was a selfless soul and refused to stand idly by as the War of the Magi raged on. She saved a great many lives on her travels, and earned the title of Archon for her deeds.
TEXT_JOBDEFRPM_00863_BERURU_000_023<tab>As her disciples, it is our duty to wander this star and shine the light of hope for those in need.
